summary: Backend/main.mo adds Chapter 1 verse records but, per the visible comment and truncated content, only includes verses 1:1–1:47. There is no visible update confirming Chapter 1 metadata verseCount=72. Also, project_state.json was modified even though the BuildRequest only constrained/required backend/main.mo changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Populate Bhagavad Gita Chapter 1 with all verses 1:1 through 1:72, with non-empty `sanskrit`, `hindiMeaning`, `englishMeaning`, `genZKrishnaInterpretation`, and `actionStep` for each verse, and ensure `getVersesByChapter(1)` and `getVerse(1,n)` cover n=1..72.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff explicitly indicates only verses 1:1 through 1:47 were added ("implementation milestone"), so verses 1:48–1:72 are not evidenced as present, meaning the full 1..72 coverage and corresponding query results cannot be met based on the shown changes.
evidence: backend/main.mo (comment: "// Verses from 1:1 to 1:47 added for implementation milestone.")

missing_requirements.requirement: Update Chapter 1 metadata returned by `getAllChapters()` so that `verseCount` for Chapter 1 equals 72.
missing_requirements.reason: No visible changes show Chapter 1's `verseCount` being set/updated to 72 in the `getAllChapters()` dataset/logic; the truncated snippet does not provide evidence this was implemented.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated; no shown update to Chapter 1 `verseCount` in chapter metadata / `getAllChapters()` output)

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state file (project_state.json) including a summary claiming verses 1–72 were added.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest requirements only specify backend changes in `backend/main.mo`; modifying `project_state.json` is not requested as part of REQ-33/REQ-34.
evidence: project_state.json (modified; summary text: "add verses 1–72 with complete interpretations/fields for all columns.")
